SEARCH
Package songsorter.music

Class SpotifySong

java.lang.Object
songsorter.music.Song
songsorter.music.SpotifySong
public class SpotifySong extends Song
Subclass of Song made for Spotify Tracks pulled from the web API.

    Modifier and Type

  • Constructor Details

    • SpotifySong

      public SpotifySong(se.michaelthelin.spotify.SpotifyApi sapi, String spotifyURL, PythonEnvHandler penv) throws MalformedURLException, IOException, URISyntaxException, se.michaelthelin.spotify.exceptions.SpotifyWebApiException, PythonError, org.apache.hc.core5.http.ParseException, InterruptedException
      Constructor that creates an object, caches the clip, and computes the emotions of the clip
      Parameters:
      sapi - the se.michaelthelin.spotify.SpotifyApi object with credentials that enable web API requests
      spotifyURL - the URL to the song
      penv - The PythonEnvHandler to pass each song to machine learning model
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URL is malformed
      IOException - If the file writing/download fails or reading/writing to CLI fails
      MalformedURLException - If the URL is not a spotify URL
      se.michaelthelin.spotify.exceptions.SpotifyWebApiException
      PythonError - If underlying Python service fails
      org.apache.hc.core5.http.ParseException
      InterruptedException - If underlying Python script fails mid-execution

    • SpotifySong

      public SpotifySong(se.michaelthelin.spotify.SpotifyApi sapi, String spotifyURL) throws MalformedURLException, IOException, URISyntaxException, se.michaelthelin.spotify.exceptions.SpotifyWebApiException, org.apache.hc.core5.http.ParseException
      Constructor that creates an object and caches the clip. It does NOT compute emotions.
      Parameters:
      sapi - the se.michaelthelin.spotify.SpotifyApi object with credentials that enable web API requests
      spotifyURL - the URL to the song
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URL is malformed
      IOException - If the file writing/download fails
      MalformedURLException - If the URL is not a spotify URL
      se.michaelthelin.spotify.exceptions.SpotifyWebApiException
      org.apache.hc.core5.http.ParseException

    • SpotifySong

      public SpotifySong(se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.specification.PlaylistTrack track, PythonEnvHandler penv) throws MalformedURLException, se.michaelthelin.spotify.exceptions.SpotifyWebApiException, IOException, URISyntaxException, PythonError, InterruptedException
      Constructor that creates an object, caches the clip, and computes emotions.

      Essentially SpotifySong(Track track, PythonEnvHandler penv) with typecasting from PlaylistTrack to Track.

      Parameters:
      track - the se.michaelthelin.spotify.specification.PlaylistTrack object representing the song
      penv - penv The PythonEnvHandler to pass each song to machine learning model
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URL is malformed
      IOException - If the file writing/download fails or reading/writing to CLI fails
      MalformedURLException - If the URL is not a spotify URL
      se.michaelthelin.spotify.exceptions.SpotifyWebApiException
      PythonError - If underlying Python service fails
      InterruptedException - If underlying Python script fails mid-execution

      Constructor that creates an object, caches the clip, and computes emotions.
      Parameters:
      track - the se.michaelthelin.spotify.specification.Track object representing the song
      penv - penv The PythonEnvHandler to pass each song to machine learning model

      InterruptedException - If underlying Python script fails mid-execution

    • distance

      public double distance(SpotifySong s)
      Finds the distance between two SpotifySong's (arousal, valence) coordinates on a Cartesian plane via the distance formula (Pythagorean theorem)
      Parameters:
      s - the other SpotifySong
      Returns:
      the distance between two points.
